#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#define ll unsigned long long int
#define MOD 1000000007
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

ll a[10010][3];

ll solve(ll pos, ll d)
{
    if (pos == 0) {
        a[pos][d] = 1;
        return 1;
    }
    if (a[pos][d] != -1)  return a[pos][d];

    ll ans = 0;
    if (d == 0) {
        ans = (ans + solve(pos-1, 1)) % MOD;
    }
    if (d == 1) {
        ans = (ans + solve(pos-1, 2)) % MOD;
    }

    ans = (ans + solve(pos-1, 0) * 9) % MOD;

    return a[pos][d] = ans;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;

    memset(a, -1, sizeof(a));

    ll n;
    solve(10001, 0);

    while(t--) {
        cin >> n;
        cout << (9 * a[n-1][0]) % MOD << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
